analysis.description:
CrowdSaleMacroansyA.isEndOk (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#299) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- endOfRewards (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#299-303)
	- endOfRewardsConfirmed (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol)

CrowdSaleMacroansyA.viewCrowdSaleLive (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#176-199) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- timeRemainingInMin == 0

Reentrancy in CrowdSaleMacroansyA.fallback (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#153-176):
	External calls:
	- (sucsBuyCoinAtToken,retPayment) = t.buyCoinsCrowdSale(msg.sender,msg.value,this) (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#159-162)
	External calls sending eth:
	- sucsTrPaymnt = _safeTransferPaymnt(msg.sender,retPayment) (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#167-168)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- amountRaised (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#174-176)
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#171-174)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_Or' of CrowdSaleMacroansyA.transferOr (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'tkn_ma_addr' of CrowdSaleMacroansyA.setContrAddr (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#92) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'ico_ma_addr' of CrowdSaleMacroansyA.setContrAddr (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#92) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_withdrawAmount' of CrowdSaleMacroansyA._withdraw (/unique_chucks/25/0x98e99289a5ee16367dc45c30cf08bda3c2926e86.sol#276-278) is not in mixedCase
